00032 /*---- replacements if not running under MIDAS ---------------------*/
00033 
00034 #ifndef MIDAS_TYPE_DEFINED
00035 #define MIDAS_TYPE_DEFINED
00036 
00037 typedef unsigned short int WORD;
00038 
00039 #if defined(__alpha) || defined(__x86_64__)
00040 typedef unsigned int DWORD;
00041 #else
00042 typedef unsigned long int DWORD;
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 #define SUCCESS  1
00046 
00047 #endif                          /* MIDAS_TYPE_DEFINED */

00054 #endif
